topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5354cb7963687233928e0000#post_5354cb7963687233928e0000
Well, in the _Jurassic Park_ toy world, there was a figure that was made by Hasbro for the Chaos Effect line, but it was never actually released. Only seven samples are known to exist. It was called an Ultimasaurus, a made-up chimera of several dinosaurs. One collector paid $5000 for one of them, if that makes the prices for your robot figures seem any lower.
!http://www.jptoys.com/toy-database/chaos-effect/prototypes/ultimasaurus/img/ultimasaurus4.jpg!
!http://img1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110116064755/jurassicpark/images/e/ec/Ultimasaurus8.jpg!
But it may have seen a very limited release, since one sample showed up on eBay in a lot. Once the seller realized what they had, they ended the auction early.
!http://www.jptoys.com/toy-database/chaos-effect/prototypes/ultimasaurus/img/ultimasaurus21.jpg!
topics.author: 50b70eeb7f123b1a02000097

"@Randomosaur":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5354cd8d63687211c00f0000#post_5354cd8d63687211c00f0000

topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5354cdfc63687211e03a0000#post_5354cdfc63687211e03a0000
The Chaos Effect toys were originally going to be for a Saturday morning cartoon, but the cartoon was scrapped. That's why they look so cartoony, if that's what you mean. Here are some more of the Chaos Effect toys.
!http://www.jptoys.com/toy-database/chaos-effect/dinosaurs/ankyloranodon/img/productshot_lowres2.jpg!
!http://www.jptoys.com/toy-database/chaos-effect/dinosaurs/paradeinonychus/img/productshot_lowres2.jpg!
!http://www.jptoys.com/toy-database/chaos-effect/dinosaurs/amargospinus/img/productshot_lowres2.jpg!
!http://www.jptoys.com/toy-database/chaos-effect/dinosaurs/compstegnathus/img/productshot_lowres2.jpg!
There are many other unreleased toys and prototypes from it, other than the Ultimasaurus.
!http://www.jptoys.com/toy-database/chaos-effect/prototypes/deinonycanis/img/Deinonycanis3.jpg!
!http://www.jptoys.com/toy-database/chaos-effect/prototypes/ceratosaurus/img/cerato1.jpg!
!http://www.jptoys.com/toy-database/chaos-effect/prototypes/stegospinus/img/Stegospinus2.jpg!
I do agree with you that the Ultimasaurus looks stupid.
topics.author: 50b70eeb7f123b1a02000097
